review.title: Optimal Junction Trees
review.abstract: The paper deals with optimization problems related to updating beliefs in networks. We deal with two processes: triangulation and construction of node trees. In the first part, we give a simple algorithm for constructing an optimal node tree from a triangulated network. In the second part, we argue that any exact method based on local calculations must either be less efficient than the node tree method, or it has an optimality problem similar to that of triangulation.
